sentence: There were thousands of soldiers in the Emperor's tomb.

sentence: I think I twisted my arm while playing basketball.

mean_cn: n.帝国，（由个人或集团控制的）大企业

sentence_tra: 这是在罗马帝国时期修建的。

mean_cn: n.基础，基地，底座adj.差的，次的

sentence_tra: 这些柱子的底座得承受巨大的重量。

sentence: We should try our best to include everybody.
sentence_tra: 我们应该尽力去把每个人包括进来。

sentence: I work in construction - I build houses.
sentence_tra: 我在建筑行业工作―我盖房子。

sentence: The leaves turn orange in autumn, which provides for some beautiful scenery.
sentence_tra: 这些树叶在秋天变成橘黄色，平添了许多美景。

mean_cn: n. 结构，构造；.建筑物v. 建筑，组织

sentence_tra: 许多新的建筑正拔地而起。

sentence: Calligraphy is an ancient form of writing art.
sentence_tra: 书法是一种古老的书写艺术。

sentence: We should admit our mistakes and learn from them.
sentence_tra: 我们应该承认自己的错误并从中吸取教训。

sentence: Use different types of bait to attract different fish.
sentence_tra: 用不同类型的诱饵去吸引不同的鱼。

sentence_tra: 我的狗能双脚站立，它甚至能自己穿鞋！

sentence: The Egyptian civilization lasted for thousands of years.
sentence_tra: 埃及文化延续了上千年。

sentence_tra: 这封信有枚红色的火漆封印。

mean_cn: v.拿住；掌握；拥有n.掌握；拥有；货仓

sentence: Ewww, there are animal remains on the side of the road!

sentence: Your thumbprint will give you access to the secret room.

mean_cn: n. 地貌，风景，风景画v. 美化环境
sentence: The landscape is beautiful, with ice-capped mountains in the background and a river.
sentence_tra: 这里风景太美了，有白雪覆盖的群山映衬，还有一条小河。

sentence: The crowd is waiting for the game to start in the stadium.
sentence_tra: 大家都在体育场内等待比赛开始。

sentence: This house was abandoned by its owners.
sentence_tra: 这个房子被它的主人遗弃了。

mean_cn: adj. 宏伟的，壮丽的，华丽的

sentence_tra: 孔雀的羽毛看起来非常华丽。

mean_cn: n. 反射;  映象;  反映;

sentence_tra: 这只猫咪在镜中看到的映象不是它自己，而是一只狮子。

sentence: This is an old sculpture.

sentence: We give you a 100% guarantee that the product will be safe.
sentence_tra: 我敢打百分之百的包票，货物一定会安全的。

sentence: Now, I'll apply some cream to your face.

mean_cn: adv.有规律地，经常，整齐地，匀称地

sentence_tra: 每天都要有规律地刷牙！

sentence: I was glad when the doctor told me my heart beat  was normal.
sentence_tra: 当医生告诉我心跳正常的时候，我很开心。

sentence: Please ensure my grammar is correct.
sentence_tra: 请确认我的语法是对的。

sentence: Be careful, don't slip on the wet floor!
sentence_tra: 小心点！不要在湿地板上滑倒了。

mean_cn: n. 过度的使用;  vt. 使用…过度;  使用…过多;

sentence_tra: 我的鞋因为穿得过多而破旧了。

mean_cn: v.恢复；治疗；补救n.治疗；补救

sentence_tra: 这种植物对你的病有疗效。

mean_cn: n. 蛋白质;  adj. 蛋白质的;

sentence_tra: 鸡蛋和培根都有很高的蛋白质含量。

mean_cn: n. 【数学】角;  角度;  角落; 角度, 观点;
sentence: The angle of each corner is 60 degrees.
sentence_tra: （这个三角形）每个角都是60度。

sentence: Makeup is very effective at hiding our physical flaws.
sentence_tra: 化妆对于隐藏我们外表的缺陷非常有效。

sentence: Wait, why am I combing my hair?--I'm bald, I don't have any hair.
sentence_tra: 等等，我为什么要梳头？我是秃头，我根本没有头发。

sentence: I can't eat any of those dairy products because they make my stomach upset.
sentence_tra: 我不能吃这些乳制品，因为它们令我胃难受。

sentence: I want to wash the dirt from my hands.
sentence_tra: 我想洗干净手上的泥。

sentence: I damaged my car when I drove off the road.
sentence_tra: 当我开下马路时撞毁了车。

sentence: Please pay attention to what I'm saying, because there will be a test on it at the end.
sentence_tra: 专心听我讲的话，因为最后会有一个相关的测试。

sentence: Try to keep the ball balanced so it doesn't fall off.
sentence_tra: 试着使球保持平衡，防止坠落。

mean_cn: n.洗发精，香波；洗发　v.洗发
sentence: This new shampoo makes my hair smell great!
sentence_tra: 新买的洗发香波使我头发闻上去很不错。

mean_cn: adj.充足的，尚可的，可以胜任的

sentence_tra: 他的表现是可以胜任的，不是非常棒，但是足够好了。

mean_cn: n. 梳子;  梳理;  vt. 梳理;
sentence: I always carry a comb because my hair often gets tangled.
sentence_tra: 因为我的头发总是打结，所以我总是带着梳子。

sentence: Her blonde curls are very beautiful.
sentence_tra: 她金色的卷发十分好看。

sentence: Don't worry, he's an expert; he'll know how to fix the computer.
sentence_tra: 不用担心，他是专家，他会知道怎么修电脑。

mean_cn: v.嗽口，(用清水)刷，冲洗掉，漂净n.嗽洗，漂洗，漂清，冲洗
sentence: You should rinse the dishes before you put them in the dishwasher.
sentence_tra: 在把盘子放进洗碗机之前要先用清水冲洗一下。

sentence: Shampoo, conditioner, and a head massage are my favorite parts of going to the salon.
sentence_tra: 洗发水，护发素和头部按摩是我去理发店最喜欢的项目。

sentence: My dog really enjoys his new hairstyle.
sentence_tra: 我的狗真的喜欢他的新发型。

mean_cn: n. 强调;  节拍;  紧迫;  压力;  vt. 给…加压力, 使紧张;  强调;
sentence: After working such a long day, she feels a lot of stress.
sentence_tra: 这样工作一整天让她压力巨大。

mean_cn: n. 套服;  请求;  诉讼;  vi. 合适;  vt. 适宜于;  使穿上套服;

sentence_tra: 你不觉得我穿这衣服很帅吗？

sentence: I'll squeeze some oranges to make orange juice.
sentence_tra: 我要榨这些橙子来做橙汁。

sentence: I decided to loosen my tie and relax.
sentence_tra: 我打算解开我的领带放松一下。

sentence: I don't know why that strange man is staring at me.
sentence_tra: 我不知道为什么那个陌生人一直盯着我。

mean_cn: v.通讯；传达；沟通，交流思想
sentence: With the Internet, I can communicate with my children whenever I want.
sentence_tra: 通过互联网，我能在任何时候跟我的孩子们聊天。

mean_cn: adj. 穿着考究的；穿着入时的

sentence_tra: 我的祖父一直是个穿着考究的人。

sentence: The damaged plane fell downwards toward the earth.
sentence_tra: 被破坏的飞机朝着地面坠落了。

mean_cn: n. 最后；上个；末尾adj. 最后的；最新的v. 度过，拖过；使维持adv. 最后地；最近地
sentence: This is the last piece of the puzzle.
sentence_tra: 这是拼图缺失的最后一块。

sentence: He is in a state of confusion.
sentence_tra: 他正处于一个混乱的状态。

mean_cn: phr. 目光接触; 眼神交会;
sentence: You do not make eye contact with the teacher. Never!
sentence_tra: 绝对不要和老师有眼神接触！

sentence: I'm more interested in your personality than your appearance.
sentence_tra: 相对于你的长相，我更在意你的品格。

sentence: Completing an exam requires a lot of concentration.
sentence_tra: 完成考试需要非常集中注意力。

sentence: "I wish he loved me," she said as she sighed with disappointment.
sentence_tra: “我希望他爱我。”她哀叹道。

sentence: As soon as she was asked the question, she ran away from her own wedding without hesitation.
sentence_tra: 当她被问到那个问题，她毫不犹豫地逃离了自己的婚礼。

sentence: Have respect for those in authority or I'll take you to jail!
sentence_tra: 给我放尊重点，否则我抓你坐牢！

sentence: I'm suffering from a serious lack of money!
sentence_tra: 我正严重缺钱！

sentence: She's been avoiding my calls all week; I don't know why she doesn't want to talk.
sentence_tra: 她这一周都没接我的电话，我不知道她为什么不想和我说话。

mean_cn: n. 信号v. 发信号；标志
sentence: When the traffic signal turns red, we should stop.
sentence_tra: 红灯亮，我们就该停下了。

sentence: As the boss, I care about all my employees.
sentence_tra: 作为老板，我非常在意我的员工们。

sentence: She has so many vivid facial expressions.
sentence_tra: 她有很多生动的面部表情。

sentence: The judge is the authority on the meaning of the law.

sentence: My phone reminded me that I have an appointment this afternoon.
sentence_tra: 电话提醒我下午还有一个约会。

sentence: She glanced at me once, but didn't look at me for the rest of the night.
sentence_tra: 那晚，她瞥了我一眼之后没再看过我。

mean_cn: n. 援助, 帮助;  补助;

sentence: I'm sorry to say, I prefer cream cake to apples.
sentence_tra: 我很抱歉地说，比起苹果我更喜欢奶油蛋糕。

mean_cn: n.印记，印象，感觉，感想，压痕

sentence_tra: 我想当我在公园遇到他时给了他一个很好的第一印象。

mean_cn: v. 尊敬，敬重n. 敬重，尊敬；方面

sentence: The meeting went on so long he thought he would die of boredom.
sentence_tra: 那个会议太长了以至于他觉得要无聊死了。

mean_cn: n. 评论, 谈论;  vi. 议论;  vt. 评论;

mean_cn: adj.年长的；资格老的，地位较高的n.(大学或高中)毕业生

sentence: I will consider your offer, but I think I can get a better price elsewhere.

mean_cn: adj. 淡淡的, 淡雅的;  精细的;  精妙的;  狡诈的;

sentence_tra: 她不喜欢妆化得太明显了，她化得尽量细致微妙。

sentence: He's used to being in high places.

sentence: This selection contains a mixture of different fruits.

sentence: The farmer used fertilizer to improve his crop production.
sentence_tra: 农民用肥料来提高作物产量。

sentence: She was amazed at the size of the diamond, but she didn't really want to marry him.

mean_cn: n. 大豆，[作物] 黄豆

mean_cn: n. 适度；节制；温和；缓和

mean_cn: adj. 有利润的;  赚钱的;

sentence: Let me prove this for you mathematically!

mean_cn: n.重量；负荷；重要性；砝码v. 加重量于，使变重

sentence: The industrial zone of the city is the source of most of the air pollution.

sentence: This medicine is still experimental - we're seeing how well it works.

mean_cn: v.养育；怀有(希望)；增强(希望等)

sentence_tra: 我们依靠农业给我们提供食物。

sentence: Farming is hard work.

mean_cn: adj.向后的，倒行的，落后的adv.向后

mean_cn: adj.经济学的，经济上的，合算的
sentence: The people of China and India have worked hard for their economic success.
sentence_tra: 中国和印度的人民为了他们经济上的成功一直努力奋斗。

sentence: Watch out--if you mix those chemicals together they will explode!
sentence_tra: 小心！如果你把这些化学制品混合在一起会爆炸的！

mean_cn: adj.正常的，，自然的；自然界的；天赋的

mean_cn: adj. 高科技的，高技术的；仿真技术的n. 高科技
sentence: They examined his brain using the latest high-tech medical equipment.

sentence: Instead of wine or beer, I always drink orange juice.
sentence_tra: 我总是喝橙汁而不是红酒或啤酒。

mean_cn: n.吃素的人，食草动物adj.素食的

sentence_tra: 很多素食菜品非常美味，就连肉食爱好者也喜欢。

mean_cn: n. 人群;  民众;  一大堆;  观众;  vi. 聚集;  涌向;  急速前进;  vt. 推挤;  塞满;  使拥挤不堪;

sentence_tra: 音乐会有很多人。

sentence: My doctor advised me to take a vacation.
sentence_tra: 我的医生建议我去度个假。

sentence: We must find new forms of energy.
sentence_tra: 我们必须找到新型的能源。

sentence: The sound coming from the speakers was very clear.
sentence_tra: 喇叭里传出的声音很清晰。

sentence: Potatoes from the store have no taste, so I grow my own.

sentence: Bottles with this sign usually contain poison.
sentence_tra: 带有这个标志的瓶子通常装着毒药。

sentence: I would love to be an astronaut and go to space.
sentence_tra: 我想成为一名宇航员并进入太空。

mean_cn: n: 食欲, 胃口, 欲望, 兴趣, 性欲;

mean_cn: n.源(泉)，发源地，来源；原始码 (计算机用语)

sentence: Get me to the hospital! I'm having a heart attack.

sentence_tra: “健康”和“奶油巨堡加咖啡薯条”只能二选一。

sentence: We spray the crops with pesticides to keep away insects.

mean_cn: n.变化，多样性，多样化，种类

sentence_tra: 很多种类的香料在这个集市都有。

sentence: The cook used many different kinds of peppers in his recipe.
sentence_tra: 这个厨师用了很多不同种类的胡椒在他的食谱里。

sentence: Taking vitamins every day is good for your health.
sentence_tra: 每天服用维他命有利于你身体健康。

sentence: The dogs were so tiny you could pick one up with one hand.
sentence_tra: 这种狗很小你都可以一只手拿起来。

mean_cn: n. 牛排;  肉块; 鱼块;

sentence_tra: 那块牛排看起来美味透顶。

sentence: Profits are increasing every year. We're rich!
sentence_tra: 收入逐年递增。我们富有了！

mean_cn: n. 矿物，矿物质adj. 矿物的

sentence: He has a lot of influence; everybody listens to him.
sentence_tra: 他有很大的影响力，所有人都听他的。

mean_cn: n. 观察者；观看者；电视观众

sentence_tra: 我们家的人都很喜欢看电视，喜欢一起看动画片大笑。

sentence: You must listen to the song in stereo to really appreciate the music.
sentence_tra: 你一定要用立体声设备听歌，这样才能真正地欣赏音乐。

mean_cn: n. 围绕物, 环绕物;  adj. 环绕立体声的;  vt. 包围;  围绕;
sentence: Look for the house with the two windows surrounded by green vines.

sentence: 3D films are very popular in movie theaters.
